messages.title: YOUR REFERENDUM VOTE UNDER THREAT
messages.content: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour, the Liberal Democrats, the SNP and other parties will join together in an unholy alliance to disrupt Brexit.

messages.title: VOTE FOR THERESA MAY ON 8TH JUNE TO SEE BREXIT THROUGH
messages.content: Theresa May's leadership will deliver the best deal for Britain as we leave the EU.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure Brexit goes ahead, prevent opposition parties from disrupting Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour, the Liberal Democrats, the SNP and other parties will join together in an unholy alliance to disrupt Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure Brexit goes ahead, SNP MPs attempt to block Brexit bill.
issues.immigration: Sky-high immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn.

quotes.text: Looming threat of a Corbyn premiership.
A Labour landslide would be a disaster for Britain.

images.caption: SKY-HIGH immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn.
SNP MPs attempt to block Brexit bill.
